assignments.name: Determine Content and Structure for index.html

spec.user_preferences: User's input on desired content and structure
spec.project_requirements: Any existing project guidelines or templates

validations: User confirms the content and structure outline

assignments.name: Create index.html File

spec.target_directory: The directory where the file will be created
spec.content_structure: The defined outline of the content and structure for index.html

validations: File is created successfully in the specified directory
